ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to MySQL Database Insert
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will take the contents of a CSV file. CSV is converted to JSON before creating and executing INSERT statement to MySQL database.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FileName":{"Value":"\"example.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the file to be read from the SFTP server."},"Directory":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Directory for files stored on SFTP server."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"127.0.0.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"table\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the database table."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string to access the database."}}
